`string`

`''`

***

#### nodes

> **nodes**: [`TreeItem`](#treeitem)[]

Defined in: [core/src/components/tree/tree.ts:79](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/tree/tree.ts#L79)

***

#### onExpandToggle

> **onExpandToggle**: (`node`) => `void`

Defined in: [core/src/components/tree/tree.ts:90](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/tree/tree.ts#L90)

An event emitted when the user toggles the expand of the TreeItem.

Event payload is equal to the TreeItem clicked.

##### Parameters

###### node

[`NormalizedTreeItem`](#normalizedtreeitem)

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### structure

Defined in: [core-bootstrap/src/components/tree/tree.ts:23](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core-bootstrap/src/components/tree/tree.ts#L23)

Slot to change the default display of the tree

### Methods

#### navSelector

> **navSelector**(`node`): `NodeListOf`\<[`HTMLElement`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement)\>

Defined in: [core/src/components/tree/tree.ts:101](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/tree/tree.ts#L101)

Retrieves expand items of the TreeItem

##### Parameters

###### node

[`HTMLElement`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement)

HTML element that is representing the expand item

##### Returns

`NodeListOf`\<[`HTMLElement`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement)\>

##### Default Value

```ts
(node: HTMLElement) => node.querySelectorAll('button')
```
